summary: A detective deals with the loss of his own son while trying to uncover the identity of a boy whose mummified remains are found in a box buried for fifty years.
cast: Jon Hamm|Josh Lucas|Rhona Mitra|James Van Der Beek|Jessica Chastain|Joanna Cassidy|Jimmy Bennett|Morena Baccarin|Michael Cudlitz|Andy Milder|Holt McCallany|Jude Ciccolella|Rick Gomez|Marcus Thomas|Graham Phillips|Christian Bender|Sam Hennings|Tom Kemp|Kali Rocha|Benjamin Burdick|Kim Hamilton|Bob Stephenson|William Charles Mitchell|Glenn Taranto|Ryan Cutrona|Ty Panitz|Ray Proscia|Elizabeth Small|Enuka Okuma|Angela Schnaible|Jeanette Brox|Kasey Campbell|Beth Grant|Cheyenne Wilbur|Pamela Dunlap|Rutanya Alda|James Mathers|Paul Keith|Jonathan Erickson Eisley|Channing Chase|Charles C. title: Stolen Lives
